VIII.iv.1.A.4.g
.
Invalid or Incomplete Research Requests to MRRC
MRRC will return to the appropriate RO any research request identified as invalid or incomplete, with an explanation of the deficiency(ies) identified.Â  MRRC then closes out the request, and it must be resubmitted as a new request to receive further consideration.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information and Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
